annonsrubrik: Jr E-com Marketing Associate - Germany (Marc Mirren)
annonstext:
ABOUT MARC MIRREN

We are a Swedish jewelry brand that designs minimalistic and fine pieces for every occasion. Marc Mirren is a young brand that consists of 7 team members. Driven by ambitious and motivated co-workers, alongside experienced founders the company culture is creative and collaborative where new ideas and initiatives are encouraged. As a growing international company, we are always open to new young professionals to join our Marc Mirren family. You might be one of them; after all, you are reading this, right?

Orange Sky AB is a Stockholm based e-commerce company founded in 2012. The company currently consists of 4 fast growing brands - Sudio, Gaston Luga, Marc Mirren and Mighty Solo - and has a track record for fast scaling of new brands internationally. Today the group of brands has 90 co-workers in Stockholm Sweden (headquarters) and 30 co-workers in Zhongshan China.

 

YOUR ROLE

Marc Mirren is now looking for a colleague for our E-commerce team for the German market.

As an E-commerce Associate, your role will be to do online marketing and develop brand awareness for Marc Mirren in your market. You will learn to find the best strategy to create knowledge about Marc Mirren. To reach that objective, you will search for bloggers, influencers, press contacts, and develop relationships with them.

This job offers you both freedom and responsibility. Hence you will be able to come up with your own ways of gaining market exposure. You will be able to share best practice with your colleagues, but will also be responsible for your own actions. You will learn about the latest strategies for e-commerce & marketing through social media channels worldwide and develop your skills on tools such as Google Analytics. Interest in sales is a big plus!

REQUIREMENTS

	You have an interest in marketing and social media.
	Fluent in written and spoken German and English is a must.
	Knowledge in the culture of Germany and social media world.
	You are not afraid to take initiatives and can work on your own.
	You are tech-savvy.
	You enjoy working towards set goals and KPI's.
	You are sales oriented.
	A university degree is a plus but not a requirement.

For this job, your personal attributes will be much more important than previous work experience. 

Send application or questions to  EMAIL  

We will go over the applications continually.

utbildningsniva.namn: Eftergymnasial utbildning två år eller längre
